description:
The mystery of the Ponegliffs is revealed - their true significance, and the story of their creation, leads closer to the Straw Hats than they might have imagined!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Geheimnis von Wano-Land – Der Kozuki-Klan und die Porneglyphs
Le secret du pays de Wano. La famille Kozuki et les ponégyphes
The Secret of the Land of Wano! The Kozuki Family and the Ponegliffs!
Wano Kuni no Himitsu: Kouzuki-ke to Rekishi no Ponegliffs
Секрет Страны Вано! Клан Козуки и Понеглифы!
سرّ بلاد وانو! عشيرة كوزكي والبونيغليف!
ワノ国の秘密 光月家と歴史の本文[ポーネグリフ]
